current.checkout_marketing_text:
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE.
ITEMS ARE NOT RESERVED UNTIL CHECKOUT IS COMPLETE.
ALL SALE ITEMS ARE FINAL SALE.
NO CANCELLATIONS OR ORDER MODIFICATIONS.
DUE TO HIGH VOLUME OF ORDERS, YOUR ORDER MAY TAKE UP TO 7-10 BUSINESS DAYS TO PROCESS AND SHIP.
ORDERS SHIPPING TO NON-EU LOCATIONS, INCLUDING UK AND ISRAEL, ARE SUBJECT TO IMPORT TAXES AND DUTIES.

See FAQ here.

current.checkout_email_accept: Receive news and offers via text message*

current.loyalty_program_intro:
The LISTBeta

A rewarding way to shop

Get on THE LISTBeta to be the first to experience the rewards of being one of our most valued customers. Enjoy a personalized experience, insider access, and points for every dollar you spend.

current.loyalty_program_faq_text:
What Is THE LISTBETA
THE LISTBETA is an invite-only preview to ANINE BING’s loyalty program offering exclusive Concierge services, a personalized experience, and rewards for our customers.
How Can I Join?
Enroll through the link above by providing your First Name, Last Name, and Email Address.

settings.title: ANINE BING BERLIN | AVAILABLE BY APPOINTMENT
ANINE BING SYDNEY
settings.description:
ANINE BING SYDENY is now open to the public. As we continue to prioritize the health and well-being of our employees and customers, we have implemented operational changes and increased safety measures outlined below. Private in-store appointments, virtual appointments, phone orders, and curbside services remain available upon request. Please contact the store by phone or email to place an order for curbside pickup, schedule an appointment with a stylist, and inquire about additional services currently offered in-store. We look forward to serving you.

- Hand-sanitizer stations can be found in all ANINE BING store locations to help combat the spread of COVID-19.

- Contactless payment options are available. Ask a store associate for more information.

settings.title: ANINE BING MIAMI
settings.description:
ANINE BING MIAMI is now open to the public. As we continue to prioritize the health and well-being of our employees and customers, we have implemented operational changes and increased safety measures outlined below. Private in-store appointments, virtual appointments, phone orders, and curbside services remain available upon request. Please contact the store by phone or email to place an order for curbside pickup, schedule an appointment with a stylist, and inquire about additional services currently offered in-store. We look forward to serving you. 

- All employees and customers are required to wear face coverings and practice safe social distancing indoors. We continue to offer complimentary silk face masks in-store while supplies last.

- Hand-sanitizer stations can be found in all ANINE BING store locations to help combat the spread of COVID-19.

- Contactless payment options are available. Ask a store associate for more information.

settings.title: ANINE BING BARCELONA
settings.description:
ANINE BING BARCELONA is now open to the public with reduced store capacity. As we continue to prioritize the health of our employees and customers, we have implemented operational changes and increased safety measures, listed below. Private appointments, virtual appointments, phone orders and curbside service are also available upon request. Please call or email the store to place an order for curbside pickup, to schedule an appointment with a stylist, or should you have any questions.
-Required social distancing of 6 feet in store (distancing markers provided in store to serve as a reminder)
-Face masks required in store for customers and employees
-Payments via card only, no cash will be accepted
-Sanitation stations provided

settings.title: ANINE BING BERLIN
settings.description: In response to COVID-19's continued impact on our community, ANINE BING Berlin is available to shop by appointment only. We are currently closed to the public until further notice. Please contact the store by phone or email to schedule a private, in-store shopping appointment or virtual styling session.As always, ANINEBING.com remains open and we look forward to serving you virtually. For customer inquiries, no-contact purchases and more, email us at ANINEBINGStoreBerlin@ANINEBING.com. Thank you for your continued support.

settings.first_body: We love hearing from our customers. Our Concierge Team is always available to help. Email us at concierge@aninebing.com or try our 24/7 live chat via the widget in the bottom right corner of this page. We strive to respond to all email inquiries within 1-2 business days.
settings.invitation: OR, Leave us a note below instead of heading to your inbox.

settings.title: retail
settings.body: View Stores, Locations, and Hours

settings.title: UK Orders
settings.question: Do you cover duties and customs on UK orders?
settings.answer: While we continue to offer free shipping and returns on all full-price orders, orders are subject to import taxes and duties due to new tax regulations in the UK. Taxes and duties will be automatically applied at checkout for orders above the EUR equivalent of 135 GBP, contingent on the exchange rate at the time of purchase. Customs duties and taxes are non-refundable through ANINE BING. However, your local customs bureau may be able to assist you with a duty refund.

settings.title: UK Orders
settings.question: How does the returns process work on UK orders?
settings.answer:
Should you need to return an order, it will be shipped to our local Mayfair store to process your refund quickly and efficiently. To initiate a full-price return request, please email concierge@aninebing.com. We are working to include pre-paid return labels with all orders in the near future. We thank you for your patience.

Customs duties and taxes are non-refundable through ANINE BING. However, your local customs bureau may be able to assist you with a duty refund.

settings.title: Payment
settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept most major credit cards, Apple Pay (on Safari Mobile & Safari Mac), Amazon Pay (in the US), and PayPal. We are working on accepting alternative payment methods in the near future.

settings.title: Payment
settings.question: Do you charge VAT?
settings.answer: All prices displayed on our European site are inclusive of VAT (Value Added Tax.) You will not be charged at checkout.

settings.title: Payment
settings.question: Do I need an account to make an online purchase?
settings.answer: You may check-out as a guest but we recommend creating an account to make your life a little easier next time you shop with us.

settings.title: Product
settings.question: How often do you launch new styles?
settings.answer: We deploy weekly drops on Tuesday mornings. To stay in the know, sign up for our newsletter at the bottom right of our homepage and follow us @aninebingofficial.

settings.title: Product
settings.question: The item I want is sold out. Is there anything I can do?
settings.answer: We try to keep our classics in stock year round. For our more seasonal items, we cannot guarantee they will be restocked. Visit the product page of any sold-out item and select your size and color. You will see a button that says “NOTIFY ME WHEN BACK IN STOCK.” If we do restock the item you have your eye on, you’ll be the very first to know.

settings.title: Product
settings.question: I keep seeing these amazing styles on Facebook and Instagram that I can’t find on your website. When will they become available?
settings.answer: Soon… we promise! We get so excited about our new styles that we sometimes share sneak peeks on social media. Send a screenshot to concierge@aninebing.com and we’d be happy to let you know the name of that item and its planned launch date.

settings.title: Product
settings.question: Why are some styles only available on the US site, but not on the European site, and vice versa?
settings.answer: Although we try to make sure we offer all styles to all of our customers, we ship from two different warehouses. Sometimes, inventory may only be available at one of our warehouses. We use your feedback to determine which items will be restocked.

settings.title: Product
settings.question: Why am I unable to order the Pure Noir perfume?
settings.answer:
At this time we are only able to ship our our new Pure Noir Eau De Parfum from our EU webshop to select countries within continental Europe due to international shipping restrictions. You can find more information on approved and restricted countries here: https://eu.aninebing.com/pages/shipping.

We understand you may be disappointed. If you would like to experience the scent, we are shipping the candle worldwide. Please see here: https://eu.aninebing.com/products/pure-noir-candle.

If you live near a store, all of our retail locations will carry the fragrance while supplies last. For store locations and information, see here: https://eu.aninebing.com/pages/stores

settings.title: Product
settings.question: Can I return the Pure Noir perfume?
settings.answer: Every Pure Noir Eau de Parfum purchase will include a complimentary sample of the Pure Noir fragrance, allowing you to test the new scent without unboxing your item. Please note, the Pure Noir Eau de Parfum is not eligible for refunds or exchanges unless the item is returned in its original packaging, unopened, and unworn within 14 days of receiving your order.

settings.title: Product
settings.question: Can I return the Pure Noir candle?
settings.answer: Our Pure Noir Candle is eligible for our standard ANINE BING return policy. Should you not love the scent as much as we do, please request your return, or an exchange, within 14 days of receiving your order. The candle must be returned unused and with its original packaging.

settings.title: Fit
settings.question: What size does Anine typically wear?
settings.answer: Anine is almost always a size XS across the board and a size 24 in bottoms.

settings.title: Fit
settings.question: Can you help me find my size?
settings.answer: Sure! Click “FIND MY FIT” on any product page to view our size chart. Please also reference the fit tips and model stats on each page. If you need any additional help, please email us at concierge@aninebing.com.

settings.title: Fit
settings.question: What does “oversized” mean?
settings.answer: Many of our styles are intended to fit a little more oversized than you may be used to. If we recommend sizing up or sizing down, we’ll let you know on the product page. Otherwise, we encourage you to take your usual size and experiment with layering, tucking, folding sleeves and more. Email us anytime for styling or fit advice.

settings.title: Fit
settings.question: Do you offer extended sizing?
settings.answer: As a result of your feedback, we are working to expand our size offerings. We now offer extended sizing for key styles. If you don’t see your size or don’t know which size to order, please email us at concierge@aninebing.com.

settings.title: Concierge
settings.question: I’d love some advice on how to style the piece I just bought. Can you help?
settings.answer: If you have any questions on fit or styling or if you’re looking for product recommendations, our concierge team is always available to help. Email us at concierge@aninebing.com or chat with us live on our website.

settings.title: Concierge
settings.question: What’s the best way to contact you?
settings.answer: We love hearing from our customers. For help finding the perfect fit or finding an item you may have seen on Instagram, we recommend chatting with us live on the site. We are available 24/7 and respond within minutes. For returns, exchanges, order status or shipping issues, we recommend emailing us at concierge@aninebing.com. We strive to respond to all customer inquiries within one business day. Please note there may be a slight delay for international time zones or during sale or holiday periods. We look forward to connecting with you!

settings.title: Concierge
settings.question: Can I call you?
settings.answer: We are currently working on providing this customer service option in the near future. In the meantime, please email concierge@aninebing.com or chat with us live on the site. We reply to chats within minutes and strive to answer all emails within 1-2 business days.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.question: Why am I being charged $100 at checkout if shipping is free?
settings.answer: We offer free shipping worldwide. However, we have two different versions of our website. On our main webshop, www.aninebing.com, you will see a pop-up to select your country. Our US webshop services the United States and the rest of the world outside of Europe and Israel. If you select a European country or Israel, you will be brought to our European webshop. Our European webshop ships for free to Europe and Israel. Please note that VAT/duties may apply for European countries outside of the EU.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.question: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.answer:
We do our best to process purchases placed during normal business hours within 1-3 business days. Please note that orders placed during the holiday season and sale periods may take 5-7 business days to process and ship. 

Average shipping times:

Within the US - less than 5 business days 

US to Canada - 3-5 business days

US to South America - 5-10 business days

US to Asia - 7-10 business days

US to Australia - 7-10 business days

US to New Zealand - 7-10 business days

US to Africa - 7-10 business days

US to Middle East - 7-10 business days



Europe to EU - 1-3 business days

Europe to non-EU country - 7-10 business days (there may be delays due to customs.)

EU to Israel - 10-14 business days

EU to UK - 3 days

settings.title: Shipping
settings.question: Do you cover duties and customs?
settings.answer: We ship DDP (Delivery Duty Paid) to all EU countries, which means we cover all relevant import taxes and duties. However, non-EU locations, including the UK and Israel, are subject to import tax and duties. For the UK, any applicable duties or taxes are automatically calculated at checkout. For all other non-EU locations, the shipping carrier will invoice you upon delivery of your goods. Non-customs related local taxes, such as Use Tax, are not covered by ANINE BING. Some countries may be subject to additional fees, such as Spain.

settings.title: Order Status
settings.question: How do I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order has been shipped, you should receive an email from us with a tracking link. If you are unable to locate this email, or believe you have yet to receive your shipping confirmation, please email us at concierge@aninebing.com.

settings.title: Order Status
settings.question: Can I cancel or modify my order?
settings.answer:
Please email us at concierge@aninebing.com as soon as you can. If your order has yet to be processed, we can still cancel your order or edit your shipping details. Please note we are unable to combine orders, alter sizes, add or remove pieces, or edit billing details once an order has been placed. We can, however, help you cancel your original order and place a new order as long as your order has yet to process.

Please note cancellations for any full-price or sale purchases are prohibited during any sale period. This restriction is also listed at checkout during sale times.

settings.title: Order Status
settings.question: What happens if my package gets lost?
settings.answer: Please email us at concierge@aninebing.com. If your package is lost in transit, we will do everything we possibly can to assist you. However, we are not responsible for packages once proof of delivery is generated.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.question: What is your return and exchange policy?
settings.answer: We offer free returns and exchanges for full-price purchases and are happy to help you find your perfect fit. If something is not quite right, returns are accepted within 14 days of receiving your order. Returns and exchanges only apply for unworn and unwashed merchandise. Merchandise received past 14 days will automatically receive store credit in the form of an ANINE BING giftcard.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.question: Are returns and exchanges free?
settings.answer:
Returns and exchanges are free for any full-price purchase within policy. Should you choose to forgo our free return service and use a different carrier at your own expense, our Concierge Team can assist you with the proper return address. We are not able to reimburse return shipping costs.

Depending on your region, you will receive a DHL, UPS, or Royal Mail return label.

You can find a nearby DHL location here: https://www.dhl.com/en/express/shipping/find_dhl_locations.html.

Please see here to find a nearby UPS location: https://www.ups.com/dropoff.

For UK customers, see here to find a nearby Royal Mail location: https://www.royalmail.com/services-near-you#/.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.question: How long does a return or exchange take to process?
settings.answer: Exchanges are processed immediately, as long as we have your desired size and color in stock. Otherwise, our skilled concierge team can help you find another item you may love. Returns may take 2-3 weeks to process.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.question: What should I do if my item is damaged or defective?
settings.answer: Please email us at concierge@aninebing.com with your order number and a short description of the issue. Please also include photos so we may better assist you.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.question: What does “final sale” mean?
settings.answer: All sale items are FINAL SALE. We are unable to process returns, exchanges, or store credit for any sale items.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.question: How do I process a return?
settings.answer:
EU customers, visit any ANINE BING store to return or exchange in person or simply use your pre-paid return label. Please note our pre-paid labels are for drop-off only. There is no charge to drop off a pre-paid return package. If you did not receive a label, or you would like to initiate an exchange, please email concierge@aninebing.com.

For customers in non-EU countries, including the UK and Israel, please email concierge@aninebing.com within 14 days of receiving your order to initiate a return and receive a pre-paid label via email.

settings.title: Marketing
settings.question: How do I unsubscribe from your newsletter?
settings.answer: Click the “unsubscribe” link at the bottom of any of our emails. If you need any further assistance, please email us at concierge@aninebing.com to unsubscribe.

settings.title: Marketing
settings.question: Do you offer discounts for first-time customers?
settings.answer:
We currently do not offer discounts to new customers, but we strongly encourage you to follow us on Instagram and sign-up for our newsletter to be the first to know about all things ANINE BING. 

You can also follow this link to opt-in for texts every few weeks. Receive exclusive access to promos, new arrivals, style tips and more - right at your fingertips: https://www.aninebing.com/pages/ablove-subscribe-page 

Unfortunately, at this time, the text list is for US customers only.

settings.title: Marketing
settings.question: I received a free gift with my purchase. If I need to make a return, can I still keep my gifted item?
settings.answer: Please contact our Concierge Team. If you purchased multiple items and only wish to return one, you may keep your gift. If you only purchased one item and need to make a return, we kindly ask that you also return your gift with purchase. If you would like to keep your gift, or if your gift has already been worn or used, a fee, depending on the cost of the item, will be deducted from your refund. If you would like to exchange item(s) in your order, our Concierge Team is happy to assist you in finding the right fit so you can continue to enjoy your free gift with purchase.

settings.title: Marketing
settings.question: I tried claiming my free gift at checkout but it didn’t work. What do I do?
settings.answer: Any promotion involving a gift with purchase requires certain thresholds that must be met. You will receive this information by email and/or when you visit our website. If you believe that you have met the promotion qualifications and something is wrong during the checkout process, please contact our Concierge Team for assistance.Please note: In most cases, you are required to enter a promotional code at checkout to redeem an offer. During the checkout process, enter the code in the “Gift Card or Discount Code” box below your order details, and above your subtotal. Make sure you click “APPLY”, otherwise the code will not be applied to your order. This will discount your purchase, altering the price of the gifted item to $0.00 or 0 EUR. If you need any further assistance, please contact our Concierge Team.

settings.title: Marketing
settings.question: I received a free gift with my purchase. If I need to make a return, can I still keep my gifted item?
settings.answer: Please contact our Concierge Team. If you purchased multiple items and only wish to return one, you may keep your gift. If you only purchased one item and need to make a return, we kindly ask that you also return your gift with purchase. If you would like to keep your gift, or if your gift has already been worn or used, a fee, depending on the cost of the item, will be deducted from your refund. settings.question: I tried claiming my free gift at checkout but it didn’t work. What do I do?
settings.answer:
Any promotion involving a gift with purchase requires certain thresholds that must be met. You will receive this information by email and/or when you visit our website. If you believe that you have met the promotion qualifications and something is wrong during the checkout process, please contact our Concierge Team for assistance.

Please note: In most cases, you are required to enter a promotional code at checkout to redeem an offer. During the checkout process, enter the code in the “Gift Card or Discount Code” box below your order details, and above your subtotal. Make sure you click “APPLY”, otherwise the code will not be applied to your order. This will discount your purchase, altering the price of the gifted item to $0.00 or 0 EUR. If you need any further assistance, please contact our Concierge Team.

settings.title: Marketing
settings.question: What is the ANINE BING x Dress for Success “Buy a Blazer, Give a Blazer” campaign?
settings.answer: In partnership with Dress for Success, ANINE BING will donate one blazer to Dress for Success for any blazer purchased on ANINEBING.com or in any participating ANINE BING retail location from December 1, 2020 until December 31, 2020 at 11:59 PM PT / 7:59AM GMT.

settings.title: Gifting
settings.question: Do you sell giftcards?
settings.answer:
Please find a link to our e-gift card here: https://eu.aninebing.com/products/gift-card

Available gift card amounts are preset. At this time we are unable to generate custom amounts. Once purchased, e-gift cards have unique gift codes that are sent via email. If your recipient does not use the whole amount all at once, it will remain on the card balance until their next order. Gift cards never expire.

EUR gift cards may be used on our EU webshop or in our European stores other than Mayfair.

settings.title: Gifting
settings.question: My friend gifted me ANINE BING. Can I exchange it for something else?
settings.answer: Please email us at concierge@aninebing.com with your order number. We’d be happy to help you exchange the gift or provide you with store credit for something new.

settings.title: Gifting
settings.question: Can online gift cards be used in-store?
settings.answer: EUR gift cards may be used in any European store other than Mayfair. Our Mayfair location only operates in GBP and cannot accept gift cards in EUR.

settings.title: FALL II
settings.text: This season we look to the French music scene of the sixties to drum up reinvented classics and unexpected textures.

settings.text_body:
ANINE BING was launched in 2012 with headquarters in Downtown Los Angeles, CA.

Inspired by the fusion of Scandinavian heritage and American spirit, ANINE BING offers luxurious staples, wardrobe basics and statement pieces that are current and timeless.

Founder and Chief Creative Officer Anine Bing thoughtfully curates each piece in her "see now, buy now" monthly collections where she marries edgy and feminine in a soft meets hard design approach.

To date, ANINE BING is sold in more than 300 boutiques worldwide. ANINE BING stores can be found in Los Angeles, New York, Paris, London, Barcelona, Madrid, Berlin, and more. Find your nearest location here.

settings.title: CLOTHING
settings.section_body: Our clothing has an overall relaxed fit, capturing an oversized look with minimalistic structure.

settings.title: JEANS
settings.section_body: Our denim is designed for a relaxed, vintage-inspired fit. Made to feel comfortable and lightly worn in.

settings.text: We redesigned our website to improve your shopping experience. Please check back in a few hours to browse the new and improved ANINEBING.com. If we can assist with anything in the meantime, please contact concierge@aninebing.com.

settings.text_body:

In the meantime, explore our new arrivals here.

settings.text: Our second collection of the season draws its inspiration from 20th century American artist Agnes Martin and her use of abstraction paired with quiet, muted color. Drawing influence from Martin’s use of complexity and mixed messaging to communicate her truth, the Spring II Collection represents the union of juxtaposing elements to achieve balance and cohesion: Smoothness and texture, modernity and timelessness, and masculinity with femininity. Clean lines, a subdued palette and airy fabrications instill structured silhouettes and sharp tailoring with a sense of softness, redefining the modern uniform.

settings.text:
“When ANINE BING first launched, we were packing and shipping orders from our garage in Silver Lake. With the support of our loyal customers and an all-star team, we’ve been able to take our vision global. Our mission is to create modern wardrobe essentials that inspire women to feel confident and empowered.”

     

– Anine Bing, Founder & Chief Creative Officer

ANINE BING is sold in 350+ stores globally, both online and in-store. Major retailers include Nordstrom, Bloomingdales, Selfridge’s, Le Bon Marche, Net-a-Porter and more. Today, ANINE BING’s brick-and-mortar presence continues to grow, with 15 retail stores––and counting––located in major cities around the world. Visit our Stores Page to find a location nearest you.

settings.text_body: ANINE BING is a Los Angeles based fashion brand started in 2012 by Anine Bing, Founder and Chief Creative Officer, and Nicolai Bing, Founder and Chief Executive Officer. Inspired by Scandinavian simplicity and American energy, Bing has built a global fashion house focused on everyday wardrobe essentials and investment pieces for modern women seeking a timeless yet rebellious approach to style. ANINE BING desig

settings.text: Every collection from ANINE BING is designed with you top of mind. We create timeless staples worth reaching for day after day, like vintage-inspired graphic tees, everyday denim, tailored suiting separates and versatile accessories.

Our product is crafted in the highest quality materials, intended to withstand the test of time. Our ongoing mission to work with fabrications that transcend trends in their simplicity and versatility should encourage our customers to minimize excess by building a wardrobe that will be cherished for longer than a single season.

settings.text_body: We are a company for women by women on a mission to build a modern-day fashion house. We believe in the power of fashion to provide simple, bold dressing that inspires confidence. Beyond building the perfect wardrobe, we stand for the women we dress. We advocate unapologetic individuality and creativity. At ANINE BING, we use our platform to encourage our customers to feel comfortable and powerful in their own skin.

settings.content_body: Timeless denim is the foundation of any modern wardrobe. Available in a variety of universal silhouettes, vintage-inspired washes, and authentic fabrications, our jeans are versatile enough to dress up or down, and transition effortlessly from work to weekends.

THE KAT JEAN

settings.text: Reinterpreted in menswear-inspired suiting fabrications, pieces come refreshed for fall in a neutral palette of ivory and black intertwined with rich, unexpected pops of bronze, army green and camel. Promising maximal versatility and seamless integration into any wardrobe, the Fall Collection by ANINE BING demonstrates uniform dressing in its purest form: Essential building blocks grounded in a timeless, rock ‘n’ roll aesthetic.

settings.text:
Inspired by model and photographer Helena Christensen’s iconic ’90s style, this limited-edition collaboration embodies an edgy, rock ‘n’ roll feel with a touch of festive allure. Day-to-night pieces are elevated with novelty details inspired by the decade, while remaining timeless and wearable enough to return to season after season.

“Helena and I met last year and I knew right away that we could create something incredible together. Her timeless, model-off-duty style has always had a major influence on ANINE BING designs, as well as my own wardrobe. I am so grateful for this partnership and can’t wait to share what we have been working on.” 


– Anine Bing, Founder & Chief Creative Officer

settings.text:
THE SPRING 2021 COLLECTION

The Spring 2021 Collection represents the melding of past, present, and future fashion genres to establish a bold, new-wave aesthetic grounded in timelessness and versatility. Deeply influenced by the legendary Debbie Harry and her razor-sharp personal style, this season's key pieces exude authentic rock 'n' roll edge and avant-garde glamour with a touch of mod influence.

settings.text:
SUMMER 2021

A collection defined by quality over quantity, Summer 2021 introduces a wearable, sophisticated wardrobe rich with structure, soft texture, and timeless details. Refined and casual all at once, key ANINE BING staples and a new, dynamic range of silhouettes are revived in a palette of natural beige, camel, and ivory intertwined with a playful Hawaiian-inspired pattern in muted neutrals. Sign up to receive an email notification when new arrivals from the Summer Collection become available.
